name: Food Planet
description:
Team:  Alpha 

Sehrish Fatima: Narrative Designer (Designing of gameplay, conceiving and designing the rules of the game

Samia Tariq: 2D Artist (designing Concept Art, Characters, textures, UI)

Masab Farooque:  Game Developer (Develop codebases for games)

Daniyal Humayun: Game Developer (Develop codebases for games)

Target Audience: Teenagers and Adult

Genre:  Hyper Casual Game (HCG)

Character Name: Hungry Fruitus, 

Monsters:  Ego, Nando

Game Overview Concept

Have you ever thought about how far different kinds of foods have traveled to get to your table? Each time you eat food, you are part of a food supply system that extends all around the world.

Platform

The platform on which game will be played is

  • Android
  • Window

Look and Feel

  • Saturated Colors   
  • Food Planet, a cubical shape planet with monsters
  • 6 continents of food planet, with different seasons
  • music
Game Flow

Game Flow Summary Game Start -> On Food Planet home destination-> Collect food from Continents -> Fight off/avoid monsters -> Collect food within the timer limit ->Bring back food to home destination -> Next level 

Elements
  • Character 
  • Fruits, Vegetables, Sweets
  • Monsters
  • 6 cube sides
  • Timer
  • Audio
  • Infinite Levels
Plot (Story Narrative)

There is a new planet discovered as a food planet with different continents and seasons. The character has to move around every continent to collect food and reach his destination within the time bond limit. While the character collects food from each continent of the planet he has to fight monsters that will distract him from collecting the food.

There is time-bound when he collects the food item, his time for collecting food will be increase

Game Mechanics
  • Swerve 
  • Tap/Timings

Movements:

  • Left, Right, forward, backward, Flip
  • Analog/Joystick- gestures 
Game Loop

Game start- player enters into Food Planet -Collect food-while collecting food fight/avoid creatures- timer limit- reach the destination at timer limit-Collision with Monter Die-
